title: LYNDA GANTT CHARTS EXPLAINED TUTORIAL
description:
What is a Gantt chart? A Gantt chart is an incredibly
helpful way to illustrate the critical deadlines associated
with any project-connecting start and end dates of
individual tasks and their interdependencies. In this
course, project management trainer and Gantt chart
aficionado Chris Croft explains how to create and use a
Gantt chart for a variety of purposes, using different
Gantt chart software. Learn how to create Gantt charts to
communicate with customers, plan resources, monitor
progress for one or multiple projects, assess risk, predict
spend, and decide whether or not you can speed up your
project. Chris also discusses the most common problems and
provides tips to help you avoid mistakes

Topics include:

* What is a Gantt chart?

* Estimating times and adding contingency

* Assessing the Gantt chart software options

* Using Gantt chart templates

* Communicating the plan

* Accelerating projects with Gantt charts
